title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       The Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial is located in an urban setting. Please remember to:    Watch your step on uneven pavement Use care crossing busy intersections Keep valuables in your car out of sight Lock your car   For the safety and enjoyment of all visitors, please:   Place trash in trash bins, or take it with you Keep bicycles off the sidewalk
